author: Mike Chiari
title: Trump National Doral Miami Golf Resort Lays off 560 Employees Amid Coronavirus
description: The  Trump National  Doral  Miami golf resort announced Wednesday that it had temporarily laid off 560 workers because of the  coronavirus  pandemic...
content:
ERIC BARADAT/Getty Images
The Trump National Doral Miami golf resort announced Wednesday that it had temporarily laid off 560 workers because of the coronavirus pandemic.
